text: Lady Gaga has a hopeful message for Ed Sheeran. ( Photo : Getty / AFP ) Twitter can be an unfriendly place for many celebrities, especially when trolls'negative voices overwhelm positive feedback from their fans. Lady Gaga is defending Ed Sheeran after he admitted to nearly quitting Twitter because of all the hate. In an Instagram post Tuesday, Gaga called Sheeran an ` ` incredible talented artist'' and implored people to treat him with ` ` love and respect.'' ` ` I wish all people on the internet would be positive and loving and apart of creating an online community that is kind and empowering, not hateful and mean,'' she wrote. ` ` No reason to tear down an artist simply because they are on top. Work harder to be kinder
